players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time, but I urge everyone to remain calm and consider all possibilities before making any hasty decisions."

Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time, but I urge everyone to remain calm and consider all possibilities before making any hasty decisions. It's important that we work together to uncover the truth."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
